content: I think I'll check out Bagail and Eagle Creek, as they seem to offer a range of products that can fit different bag sizes and styles. I'm interested in a removable insert that can provide additional compartments and pockets to keep my belongings organized. Do you think it's a good idea to invest in a bag organizer or insert before I purchase a new bag, or should I wait until I have the new bag to see what kind of organizer I need?
